headline: M&T Bank fourth-quarter profit jumps 41% on higher fee income
summary: M&T Bank on Thursday reported a 41% rise in fourth-quarter profit, as it earned more in fees from institutional services and the wealth management business after markets soared on interest rate cuts...

headline: M&T Bank Corporation (NYSE: MTB) announces fourth quarter 2024 results
summary: BUFFALO, N.Y., Jan. 16, 2024 /PRNewswire/ -- M&T Bank Corporation reports quarterly net income of $681 million or $3.86 of diluted earnings per common share and full-year net income of $2.59 billion...
